name: 20-Min KB Full Body (@Asgooch)
description: Only got 20 minutes and one kettlebell? Swings, goblet squats, rows, goblet press — 10 reps each, 5 rounds. @Asgooch says do this 3x/week to get fit from home.

exercises.notes: Single arm, 10 per side. Pull with back.
Goblet press — both hands, KB at chest to overhead.

tips: 20 minutes, one kettlebell — that's all you need
Do this 3x per week for general fitness
No rest between exercises, 60 seconds between rounds
Perfect for home, hotel, or outdoor training
